SELECT RD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, RD.rwmatr_order_deta_id AS rwmatr_order_deta_id, R.NM AS NM, R.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, RD.UNTPRC AS UNTPRC, RD.QY AS QY, V.VEND_ID AS VEND_ID, V.VEND_NAME AS VEND_NAME, RO.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT, RD.DUDT AS DUDT, RD.QY*RD.UNTPRC AS TOTALPRICE FROM RWMATR_ORDER_DETA RD JOIN RWMATR_ORDER RO ON(RD.ORDER_ID = RO.ORDER_ID) JOIN RWMATR R ON(RD.RWMATR_ID = R.RWMATR_ID) JOIN VEND V ON(R.VEND_ID = V.VEND_ID)
TRUNC(RO.ORDER_DT) >= to_date(#{startDate})
AND TRUNC(RO.ORDER_DT) <= to_date(#{endDate})
AND R.NM LIKE '%'||#{rwmName}||'%'
AND V.VEND_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vendName}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_DT FROM RWMATR_ORDER
TRUNC(ORDER_DT) >= to_date(#{startDate})
AND TRUNC(ORDER_DT) <= to_date(#{endDate})
ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT RD.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, RD.rwmatr_order_deta_id AS rwmatr_order_deta_id, R.NM AS NM, R.RWMATR_ID AS RWMATR_ID, RD.UNTPRC AS UNTPRC, RD.QY AS QY, V.VEND_ID AS VEND_ID, V.VEND_NAME AS VEND_NAME, RO.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT, RD.DUDT AS DUDT, RD.QY*RD.UNTPRC AS TOTALPRICE FROM RWMATR_ORDER_DETA RD JOIN RWMATR_ORDER RO ON(RD.ORDER_ID = RO.ORDER_ID) JOIN RWMATR R ON(RD.RWMATR_ID = R.RWMATR_ID) JOIN VEND V ON(R.VEND_ID = V.VEND_ID)
